title: What if I am not offered any hostel in Amity Noida? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually it is very late now for Hostel admission. There has always been a problem of Hostel in Amity Noida. But no worries, there are other options, that are actually better than Hostel. There are many PGs near Amity, some of them are at walking distance and some of them are not(but those are too not too much far). But the point is that you may easily get a PG with some of them providing better services and facilties than the Hostel. They also has less restrictions and you can visit places(which you can only do on weekends if you opt for Hostel). You can also opt from many fltas that people give on rent, but that option is better for people who have studied at Amity for some time, because they can find some friends with whom they can share the flat and its rent so that it is not so much costly for them. So your best option for now is a PG, then after an year or two, you can choose a flat to live in with some of your friends. One of my friend opted for Hostel in his first year(he got a non-AC) and wasn’t happy about it, so he now found a flat and some of his friends to share it with them. It will cost him not more than ₹7–8 thousand including all bills(electricity and water etc) per person. So this option is much better for him because of less restrictions, more freedom, better friends to share the flat with, and AC(which he wasn’t able to get in Hostel). If you are going to get in Amity Noida, I would like to make one thing very clear, there will be too much distractions, so it is better to focus on your studies rather than on those distractions. I am not saying that you don’t enjoy your college life and have fun, but do that in a limit so that it doesn’t affect you or your future.

You are very late for Hostel admission, but you can request to Hostel director mam Chaya to grant you hostel seat there is no other option left. Tell your problems u'll face if u'll not get hostel as you are fresher you don't know anything about the city and tryto convince her. She can provide you room in hostel. And it's better to stay in hostel for freshers. Check out this link Vansh Chaudhary's answer to In Amity, Noida, is it better to stay in the campus hostel or a PG room outside the campus? Hostel life is best. Beat of luck. Enjoy your graduation years at fullest. Don't do drugs
